product_overview: Vitan Task Management is a comprehensive full-stack application designed to streamline task and project management with integrated team collaboration, real-time analytics, and WhatsApp-based communication. It supports multi-language inputs and offers a modern, accessible, and responsive user interface.
core_goals: Provide robust task management with CRUD operations, status tracking, and commenting.
Enable efficient project management and team collaboration with role-based access.
Integrate WhatsApp messaging and OTP-based authentication for seamless communication.
Deliver data-driven insights through analytics and dashboards.
Ensure accessibility, responsive design, and high performance across devices.
Implement strong authentication and secure API interactions.
key_features: Authentication system supporting WhatsApp and email OTP verification.
Complete task management including creation, editing, deletion, status tracking, and comments.
Project management with creation, team collaboration, and analytics.
Team management with user roles and collaboration features.
WhatsApp integration for messaging, notifications, and admin controls.
Template system for quick task and project setup.
Comprehensive analytics dashboard with data visualization.
Reusable accessible UI component library using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.
Robust client-side form validation with multi-language support.
React Router-based navigation and protected routes.
Responsive mobile-first design and accessibility compliance (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support).
Backend API client with retry logic and error handling.
user_flow_summary: User registration and login via WhatsApp or email OTP verification.
Dashboard landing page showing overviews of tasks, projects, and team activities.
Task creation flow with multi-language input, form validation, assignment, and status updates.
Project creation and management with team assignment and collaboration.
Team member management including role assignment and contact management.
Accessing analytics to view charts and performance metrics related to tasks, projects, and teams.
WhatsApp messaging workflows for notifications and communications routed through the admin dashboard.
Template management for reusing predefined task and project configurations.
Navigating through the application with responsive UI elements and accessible keyboard controls.
validation_criteria: All task CRUD operations function correctly with validation and error handling.
Users can authenticate successfully with OTP for WhatsApp and email flows.
Projects and teams can be created, updated, and deleted with appropriate permissions.
WhatsApp message sending and webhook integrations operate reliably.
Frontend UI components render without React warnings and are responsive across devices.
Form validation correctly handles multi-language input and shows real-time feedback.
API endpoints return expected responses and handle errors gracefully.
Analytics dashboard renders accurate and timely data visualizations.
Accessibility standards met including ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.
Authentication with JWT and session management works securely and correctly.
Application performs well under typical load and handles errors without crashing.
